sentence: No peacocking just sophisticated service and thoughtfulness 247
Our sunset water bungalow was the perfect romantic setting for the special occasion
We were extremely happy that we extended our stay and once again had to experience the devastation of ending our vacation
We did plenty of snorkeling and even our first diving experience whilst on the island

Our kids learned a lot at the Biology Center and releasing a healed turtle back into the Ocean has been such a nice experience Kuda Hura has a great team of people committed to make your stay unforgettable in every aspect
The beauty of the island and its surrounding coupled with the efficiency and meticulous running of the resort makes every trip there a dream vacation
Amazing location amazing accommodation amazing amenities but above all the Four Seasons Kuda Hura has the most amazing service I have ever has the privilege of experiencing

I don t know how but they manage to do it they find the way to surprise us with new experiences and amazing adventures every year with the same caring loving attention to details that make our time there so special

So we decided to donate and dedicated it to our niece for her bday coming up in Dec figured it would be a cool memory for her as she can come visit the coral in future and we also contributed to a good cause
The idyllic setting and superb accommodation are beyond expectations and will definitely plan a return trip
I had a previous terrible experience and Ronaldo was by my side the entire time making sure I was comfortable
This tour is basically a behind the scenes tour for the guests
We had a mixed feelings to what we had experienced on the first two days of our visit
This is my seventh time traveling to the Maldives and I have been to the Four Seasons Resort three times not only for its vibrant atmosphere but also for the amazing food and SPA
My Partner mentioned the Spa experience was the best massage she has had in her lifetime
I can not recommend the entire experience any higher
it is no wonder that the guest experience is so special
Kuda Hura ’s commitment to the environment is quite impressive from the complete elimination of plastic bottles from the resort to it ’s sanctuary for the rehabilitation of injured turtles
Being over the water is an amazing experience however it can get a bit noisy at night if the tide is coming in
Of course the competition between the new hotels is big but in every aspect the resort is still perfect

The past week has just been an incredibly touching hospitality experience never before have I witnessed such minute attention to detail and that too by a wide variety of hotel staff especially housekeeping
